thread.title: Thng Bock Cheng John
thread.title_full: AirportRentals.com reviewed by Thng Bock Cheng John

author: Thng Bock Cheng John
title: Thng Bock Cheng John
text:
Arrival and collecting car a breeze even in the early morning.
Upon returning the car there was a slight problem as the person was not at the kiosk thus have to go to arrival hall to to inform them, found the person was at the arrival hall solving some problem. As I was paying in cash there was no change for the amount due to me. I have to go around the shop to get small changes to settle the correct amount.
